meanings.definition: A flexible rodlike structure that forms the main support of the body in the embryos of all chordates and in the adults of the primitive chordates.
meanings.sent1: During development, notochords provide essential support for the body in chordate embryos.
meanings.sent2: Primitive chordates rely on notochords for structural integrity.
meanings.sent3: The notochords at the party were the backbone of the dance floor.
meanings.sent4: Her determination was as strong as the notochords of a mighty whale.
meanings.sent5: The notochords, like sturdy pillars, held up the entire structure of the organism.
